titleStmt.title: John W. Ray to James W. Tate
CWG8056

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
Indianapolis Inda
July 29, 1863
Jas W. Tate Esq
Asst Secty of State
Frankfort Ky
Sir
Enclosed find Five (5) Dollars fee for Commission issued to me July 25/63 as Comr of Deeds for Inda.
Also my oath of office & certificate of Notary Public, who by the laws of this State is authorized to administer oaths.
I presume this is correct, in form & substance.
Accept thanks for your prompt reply to my letter

I am Sir
Respectfully Yours
Jno W, Ray

Indiana
Oath of Jno. W. Ray
Comr of Deeds
Filed Aug 4 1863.
